line.originaltext: 1 eggplant, seeded and cut lengthwise into 1/4 inch slices
line.annotation: create_ing(ing31, "1 eggplant, seeded and cut lengthwise into 1/4 inch slices")

line.originaltext: 1 red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips
line.annotation: create_ing(ing32, "1 red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips")

line.originaltext: salt and pepper to taste
line.annotation: create_ing(ing33, "salt and pepper to taste")

line.originaltext: 1 French baguette
line.annotation: create_ing(ing34, "1 French baguette")

line.originaltext: 2 ounces soft goat cheese
line.annotation: create_ing(ing35, "2 ounces soft goat cheese")

line.originaltext: 1/4 cup tapenade (olive spread)
line.annotation: create_ing(ing36, "1/4 cup tapenade (olive spread)")

line.originaltext: 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
line.annotation: create_ing(ing37, "1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese")

line.originaltext: Preheat the oven broiler.
line.annotation: create_tool(t6, "oven")

line.originaltext: Preheat the oven broiler.
line.annotation: set(t6,"broil")

line.originaltext: Place the eggplant and red bell pepper on a medium baking sheet, and season with salt and pepper.
line.annotation: create_tool(t7, "baking sheet")

line.originaltext: Place the eggplant and red bell pepper on a medium baking sheet, and season with salt and pepper.
line.annotation: put(ing31, t7)

line.originaltext: Place the eggplant and red bell pepper on a medium baking sheet, and season with salt and pepper.
line.annotation: put(ing32, t7)

line.originaltext: Place the eggplant and red bell pepper on a medium baking sheet, and season with salt and pepper.
line.annotation: combine({ing31, ing32}, ing38, "vegetables on a baking sheet", "container logic")

line.originaltext: Place the eggplant and red bell pepper on a medium baking sheet, and season with salt and pepper.
line.annotation: combine({ing33, ing38}, ing39, "seasoned eggplant and pepper", "season the vegetables")

line.originaltext: Broil 5 to 10 minutes, until tender and slightly browned.
line.annotation: cook(ing39, t6, ing40, "broiled eggplant and peppers", "for 5 to 10 minutes")

line.originaltext: Cut baguette in half lengthwise.
line.annotation: create_tool(t8, "bread knife")

line.originaltext: Cut baguette in half lengthwise.
line.annotation: cut(ing34, t8, ing41, "cut-in-half baguette", "in half, lengthwise")

line.originaltext: Spread bottom half with goat cheese, followed by tapenade.
line.annotation: combine({ing35, ing41}, ing42, "cheesed baguette", "spread cheese on lower half of baguette")

line.originaltext: Spread bottom half with goat cheese, followed by tapenade.
line.annotation: combine({ing36, ing42}, ing43, "olived, cheesed baguette", "spread over goat cheese on baguette")

line.originaltext: Layer with eggplant and red pepper, then sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing40, ing43}, ing44, "veggiespreadbread", "layer the vegetables onto the spreads on the bread")

line.originaltext: Layer with eggplant and red pepper, then sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing37, ing44}, ing45, "open face veggiespreadbread with cheese", "sprinkle cheese on top of veggies")

line.originaltext: Cover with top half of baguette.
line.annotation: do(ing45, , ing46, "sandwiches", "put top half back on")

line.originaltext: Cut into 4 pieces.
line.annotation: cut(ing46, t8, ing47, "four sandwiches", "into four pieces")

line.originaltext: Serve hot or cold.
line.annotation: serve(ing47,"hot or cold")
